channel.title: Review/Blog Site
channel.description:
I Started An Review/Blog about Servers.
I know ill get flamed for this but whatever i wanna do it for fun.
But i would like suggestions on what servers i can review.
Requirements: Has To Be An Hosted Server With Website.
Also having forums for that would be nice. just post the name of the server here no links please.
If you would like to view my server review site? pm me for link.
I Am also looking for people that have great ideas, and is wanting to help but dont have to.
Thank You
-Steven (Sky scape live owner)

item.title: Review/Blog Site
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:

item.title: Review/Blog Site
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

Just go on there and browse through the top list, or pages of servers, or go to all the server status pages (rune locus, r-s, frugoo, etc)
